name: Colorful Pastorale, Sonata
effect:
[Melody]‐[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000. This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], reveal cards from the top of your deck until a card with [Melody] is revealed, call that card with [Melody] to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Colorful Pastorale, Canon
effect:
[Melody]‐[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, you may [Soul-Charge 1]. This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and until end of turn, when your opponent would call guardians from his or her hand, he or she must call two or more at the same time.

name: Colorful Pastorale, Serena
effect:
[Melody]‐[AUTO](VC/RC):When it's attack hits a vanguard, if your hand has four or less cards, draw a card. This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].
[ACT](VC):[COST][Counter-Blast 3], and return three cards with [Melody] from your drop zone to your hand.

name: Colorful Pastorale, Fina
effect:
[Melody]‐[CONT](VC/RC):This unit gets "Intercept" and "[AUTO]:When it intercepts, this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.". This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 2], and for this turn's battles, your "when attack hits" effects activate even if the attack did not hit.

name: Colorful Pastorale, Caro
effect:
[Melody]‐[CONT](VC/RC):This unit gets "Boost" and "[CONT](RC):During the battle it boosted, this unit gets [Power] +5000.". This is shared by all of your units with [Melody].
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], search your deck for up to one "Colorful Pastorale, Caro", reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Top Star, Cier
effect:
[CONT](RC):Your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit cannot be attacked.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & reveal a grade 3 card from your hand], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with [Melody] from among them, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Diva of Atlantea, Iryna
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, reveal ten cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, at the end of the first battle of this turn, [Stand] this unit. Shuffle your deck.

name: Unparalleled Ingenuity, Loura
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, reveal ten cards from the top of your deck, and if all of the normal units revealed have different card names, call any number of the revealed cards to (RC), and they get [Power] +10000 until end of turn. Shuffle your deck.

name: Heart Monopoly, Anezka
effect: [AUTO](VC):When placed, reveal ten cards from the top of your deck, and shuffle your deck. If all of the normal units revealed have different card names, acquire one Imaginary Gift: Force, Accel, and Protect in any order.

name: Greenness Energy, Salia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks and is not boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, increase or decrease this unit's [Power] to match one of your vanguard's [Power]. (Match the [Power] at that time)

name: Blue-Silver Diva, Brume
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your opponent's turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Masterly Cover, Minne
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw two cards, return a card from your hand to your deck, and shuffle it. If you do not have a rear-guard with the same card name as your vanguard on your (RC), return three cards to your deck instead of one.

name: Favored Child Idol, Eno
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During the battle it attacked a vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
[AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits a vanguard, you may return this unit to your hand.

name: Fluffy Wonder, Preenez
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your deck is shuffled by your card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Rainy Tear, Stezza
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted a vanguard, [COST][retire this unit], draw a card, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a grade 3 card from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], and draw a card.

name: Glittery Baby, Lene
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: Shapely Eyes, Ruhe
effect: [CONT](RC):If you drew a card during this turn by your card's ability, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Includes [Draw] too. Does not include drive checks and cards that were "put")

name: Super Hit Medley, Paterle
effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If this unit is on (RC), then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and one of your vanguards gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Devoted Time, Inasta
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Boost", and can intercept from the back row.

name: Friendly High-Touch, Scioltia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, if your opponent called a total of two or more guardians during this turn, this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.

name: Reverberator, Dies
effect:
[CONT](RC):This unit gets [Power] +5000 for each of your grade 3 rear-guards.
[CONT](GC):If you have a grade 3 rear-guard, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Lovable Spontaneity, Voll
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if you called another rear-guard during this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
[CONT](RC):During the battle it boosts, if you have five rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Admirative Solo, Atri
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have no other units in the same column as this unit, this unit cannot be chosen or retired by your opponent's card effects. (It can be attacked. It is retired when hit)

name: Sugary Lordling, Ravoure
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks or boosts, if your opponent called a total of two or more guardians during this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.

name: Equable Career, Spiana
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, you may return a card with the same card name as a grade 3 card on your (VC) or (RC) from your drop zone to your deck. If you returned a card, shuffle your deck, and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Officious Luscious, Thoria
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][retire this unit], look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or bottom of your deck, and draw a card.

name: Crawl-up Girl, Est
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a total of two grade 3 cards with different card names from your hand], search your deck for up to one grade 4 card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Deliberate Bash, Strasica
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have a grade 3 or greater unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets "Intercept" and can intercept from the back row.

name: Fixation on Cuteness, Paparla
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a rear-guard with the same card name as your vanguard on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +15000.

name: Welcome Sing, Ouvil
effect: [CONT](RC):If another rear-guard was called by your card's ability during this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Class Session, Ostina
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, if all of the units on your (VC) and (RC) have different card names, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Strive Dream, Radue
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have a rear-guard with the same card name as your vanguard on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.

name: Bolstered Elegance, Leshar
effect: [CONT](RC):If your soul has two or less cards, this unit gets [Power] +2000. If your soul has no cards, it gets [Power] +5000 instead of +2000.

name: Full of Mischievousness, Sirrah
effect: [CONT](RC):If your hand has five or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Novice Idol, Piena
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Self-Management, Ralentesse
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it boosted a vanguard, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, [COST][retire this unit], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Dance Queen, Prach
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have five or more cards in your hand, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Pure Gifter, Aliche
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Max Shout, Culie
effect: [AUTO]:When your drive check reveals this card, you may put a trigger unit from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck.

name: Handmade Lover, Elena
effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
